title: My league of legends got hacked.
body:
Hey, I've played league of legends for quite a while. I had a account with the name "NightCry3" for a while ago my Email got hacked, and my league got Disabled. I've tried anything to get my account back. i've spent alot of money on the account, and i've been well behaved aswell.
I've sent alot of tickets to Riot, but nothing has happend. All i want is to have my account back.
This account i'm writing on now, i bought this so i could play with my friends, and it just got banned, so i'm not really happy.. i want my main account back, please any help would be great.

-NightCry3

replies.body: Our account recovery team won't restore an account unless they're absolutely sure it's being returned to the owner.  We don't support account selling, trading, or gifting.  Even if you aren't able to recover it the first time, its' totally fine to try again.  Reach out to us again through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will be happy to look into it again.  Goo luck!
I got it back! so everything is fine, i was so happy that i got it back! <33
